name: "Dehumanization - Black Metal Blitz" Limited Split CD
description:
• Band: Infernal Nature / Crux Infernum
• Album: Dehumanization - Black Metal Blitz
• Country: Israel / Israel
• Cat No: CDGR001CD

• Limited to 500 Hand Numbered Copies

Infernal Nature :
Infernal Nature is a one man band project formed in 2003 by Ferum. Infernal Nature plays uncomprimizing Raw underground 
Black metal. The music composition is influenced by the early scandinavian black metal scene, bands such as Darkthrone, 
Mayhem & Gorgoroth of the early days, and bands from nowadays, such as Craft, Armagedda, Urgehal, Watain, Endstille and 
many more.The energy in the music is violent and brutal, soaked with the vibe of true black metal, merging with hate & pain.

Crux Infernum :
Crux Infernum is a one man Black Metal project,formed by Rahovart in the year of 2004.
Heavily influenced by Raw Black Metal and dark classical compositions,Rahovart decided to write music that would be 
melancholic and depressing to the max.Mainly Influenced by artists such as Judas Iscariot,Nargaroth,Gorgoroth,Ludwig Van Beethoven.

Infernal Nature : 
1.Returning the key 
2.Religion for the weak 
3.Bombs in heaven 
4.I stand for
5.Fading into decay
6.Rotten from within
7.Manipulator
8.Declaring war
Crux Infernum :
9. Of Despair and Supreme Misery
10. March of The Black Rats
11. Welcome The End of Existence
12. As The Winds Pierce My Heart

name: "Pro Auturnum" CD
description:
• Band: Erowid
• Album: Pro Aeturnum
• Country: Scotland, UK
• Cat No: CDGR002CD

Born from a growing disillusionment at the stagnancy, lack of conviction and lack of originality    around them,Erowid sought to create a new musical extremity never heard before within the Scottish scene.Founded at the end of 2006 after the demise of their former band Ex Infernis by Chris B and MCG, they set out to bring together the most extreme aspects of underground music into one unique blackened sound.

With a passion for all extreme music and incorporating this broader spectrum (especially the electronic/industrial genres but also classical music and many others) into their metal roots,Erowid gained more musical freedom allowing them to create a darker and more extreme sound with aspects not so commonly found within the black or death metal scene.

Inspired by their own personal misanthropic views and a hatred of religion, humanities attitudes and its disregard for the planet,and an appreciation of mind-altering substances Erowid were now set to unleash a new hell upon the world.

1. Descending 
2. Unleash The Extermination 
3. ATG 
4. Pro Aeturnum 
5. End Game (Prophecy of Flames) 
6. The Final Release

name: "H​.​I​.​V. Parade" Limited CD/DVD Format
description:
• Band: Impure Domain
• Album: H.I.V. Parade
• Country: Italy
• Cat No: CDGR003CD

• Limited to 150 Copies
• Packaged in DVD Format 

IMPURE DOMAIN was born in the end of 1998, by the union of Angy and Mikheil.
Winter 2007 saw the rerelease of “H.I.V. PARADE” on DVD Cd Format,their most extreme album ever, weird, apocalyptic, 
visionaire and full of technique.
“H.I.V. PARADE” boasts a unique style of music ranging from black metal, avantgarde, electro- trance, 
while the lyrics follow the nihilistik path (Cioran, Celine, esoteric studies)
“H.I.V. PARADE” is a destructive, disgusting, rabid trip through the chambers ov extreme sounds and splattering scenarios.


1. R.N.A.The triumvirate	
2. Nihilistik 04:11
3. Diable deluxe

7. Lasertron rebellion
8. Visionoir ov the grotesque

13. The Endmost Pitch

name: "The Advent of Neurosis" CD
description:
• Band: The Downspiral to Hell • Album: The Advent of Neurosis • Country: Spain • Cat No: CDGR005CD “The Advent of Neurosis” the debut full release from Spains The Downspiral To Hell.” The album shows a vast array of musical influences showing a complex and strange mix of brutal death/black metal and Industrial metal, lots of experimentation and bizarre keypads. Madness, insanity, anger.... are just three words to describe this brutal yet original release and will prove that 2008 will be the year of the Neurosis.
1. Unshaken
2. By Seven Needles
3. Withered Passage
4. The Stage of Lunacy
5. I Am The Authority
6. The Left Hemisphere

8. The Right Hemisphere
9. Boundaries of A Mind Landscape
10. Out of Focus
11. The Sordid And Insane Thoughts
